title: Reorder task entry section in New Mission dialog

requirements.summary: Move the task entry row to directly under the mission title input in the New Mission creation dialog and show the tasks list immediately beneath it (while preserving all existing behaviors).
acceptanceCriteria: When creating a new mission, the task input row is visually placed directly beneath the mission title input (above the scrollable task list).
After adding tasks, the newly added tasks are visible in the task list directly below the task input, without requiring the user to scroll to the bottom area where the task input previously lived.
The Create Mission and Cancel actions remain available and keep their current behavior (including disabled/loading states).
No other screens, mission detail behavior, mission list behavior, or non-mission features are changed.

file_operations.description: Reorder the JSX layout in the New Mission creation dialog so the task entry UI ("Add a new task..." input + add button) appears immediately under the mission title input, and the tasks list renders directly below that. Keep the existing task add/toggle/remove logic, ScrollArea usage, and Create Mission/Cancel button behaviors (including disabled/loading states) unchanged. Limit changes strictly to layout/structure within this file.
